recipe.name: Lo Mein
recipe.author: https://damndelicious.net/2014/10/03/easy-lo-mein/
recipe.description: A chinese dish with egg noodles containing sliced vegetables stir-fried in a seasoned sauce.

SauceIngredients.sauceIngredient: 2 tablespoons reduced sodium soy sauce, or more, to taste
½ teaspoon Sriracha, or more, to taste

steps.step: In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, sugar, sesame oil, ginger and Sriracha; set aside.
In a large pot of boiling water, cook noodles according to package instructions; drain well.

Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add garlic, mushrooms, bell pepper, and carrot. Cook, stirring frequently, until tender, about 3-4 minutes. Stir in snow peas and spinach until the spinach has wilted, about 2-3 minutes.
Stir in egg noodles and soy sauce mixture, and gently toss to combine.
